mainText: From time to time we'll display some news and polls to orientate Qrop's developement.

news.title: Creation of the News interface in Qrop
news.desc: Allow users to know about the latest features of Qrop and participate in the roadmap via some polls.

news.title: Poll on Qrop usage
news.desc: We propose this poll in order to better know Qrop's users and understand your needs to orientate accordingly our development roadmap.
